General.Name: Morenzo Abadi Perkasa Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT Morenzo Abadi Perkasa Tbk produces, processes, and exports frozen and canned seafood. The company offers canned crabs, sardines, lemuru, mackerel, tuna, squid, octopus, cuttlefish, pasteurized crab meat, crab and lobster, and vannamei shrimp, as well as anchovies, clams, and snail meat. It also engages in the wholesale trading of processed fishery products; and offers warehousing and storage services. The company markets its products to North America, the Asia Pacific, and Europe. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Demak, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Demak Kudus Km 10, Demak, Indonesia, 59581
